metadata.name: Weaving the world #1
metadata.description:
***Weaving the world #1***, 2022
VR drawing, glb

1 of 1

The world is connecting you, me, and us with thin lines like a thread.

This artwork is a sculpture created through VR(Virtual Reality) drawing. You could touch, spin, zoom in, zoom out the artwork with your fingers. You can also display and appreciate works in your space through AR(Augmented reality).
